In this online course, you will learn the fundamental principles of FERPA (The Family Educational Rights & Privacy Act) and how they apply to the college setting. Throughout the course, you'll find special features to help guide you to compliance.


[TERM Key Terms (hover over me)] Simply hover over these highlighted words to display the meaning of the term.[/TERM]


[CASESTUDY This feature provides examples of situations that relate to FERPA guidelines in the college setting. Click "Show Answer" to reveal the outcome of the study.]Instead of just learning the principles of the act, case studies make the material relevant to real-life situations.[/CASESTUDY]

Compliance Quizzes

These short quizzes are placed at the end of each learning module to test your understanding of the concepts presented. You cannot move to the next module until you have passed the quiz.

Your Certificate

After completing the final exam, you will receive a certificate. If you would like to know more about FERPA, see the "Resources and References" section of the course syllabus. The Office of the Registrar can answer questions concerning how your school complies to FERPA guidelines.
